data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Tigres to take a throw-in in America territory.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for America in the half of Tigres.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 5, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Tigres needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 8, Tigres have a goal kick.
Tigres are pushing forward but Nicolas Lopez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 10, Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of America.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
America advance rapidly upfield but Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava blows for offside.
In the minute 15, Free kick in a good position for Tigres!
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tigres.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Tigres in Mexico City.
Free kick America.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Tigres throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to America.
Corner awarded to America.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Tigres a goal kick.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
Throw-in Tigres.
In the minute 29, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 34, Javier Aquino is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 39, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
America's Santiago Caseres has been booked in Mexico City.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 40, Javier Aquino is back on his feet again.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guido Pizarro (Tigres) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 42, Sebastian Cordova is on target to give America a 1-0 advantage.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Mexico City.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 47, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luis Quinones is replacing Jesus Duenas for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of America.
In the minute 50, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Tigres's Luis Quinones gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Tigres in the half of America.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a America throw-in in Tigres's half.
America have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Tigres have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac is on target but unsuccessful.
Tigres to take a throw-in in America territory.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 60, Richard Sanchez (America) has received a yellow card from Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to America.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Free kick Tigres.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick America.
In the minute 64, Luis Rodriguez (Tigres) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for America in the half of Tigres.
Ricardo Ferretti (Tigres) is making a second substitution, with Leonardo Fernandez replacing Nicolas Lopez.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for Tigres, close to America's area.
Miguel Herrera is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Azteca with Andres Ibarguen replacing Giovani Dos Santos.
In the minute 71, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
The away team have replaced Diego Reyes with Jordan Sierra. This is the third substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
In the minute 74, Free kick for America in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards America a goal kick.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, America pushes forward through Henry Martin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Mexico City Tigres attack through Rafael Carioca. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 80, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Richard Sanchez with Ruben Gonzalez. This is the second substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Leonardo Suarez for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
The home team replace Leonardo Suarez with Sergio Diaz.
In the minute 86, America move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Emanuel Aguilera is the scorer with a header!
Sebastian Cordova instrumental with a fine assist.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tigres.
In the minute 89, Andre Pierre Gignac keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
At Estadio Azteca the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
America have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
Carlos Salcedo (Tigres) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! America extend their lead to 3-1 through Sebastian Cordova.
